title: Journal of a tour through the Highlands of Scotland during the summer of MDCCCXXIX.
author: Botfield, Beriah
snippet: 249rounding the handsome modern mansion of Drumfin, the residence of Maclean, " the chief of thesandy Coll," situated under a range of woody cliffs,upon the margin of a lovely lake, at the easternpoint of the Bay of Tobermory.

title: Journal of a tour through the Highlands of Scotland during the summer of MDCCCXXIX.
author: Botfield, Beriah
snippet: heard to pour amidst the woody recesses ofDrumfin, the romantic residence of M'Lean, theLaird of Coll, on the opposite side of the bay.
